SELECT USER_INQUIRY_NO, USER_INQUIRY_TITLE, USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST, USER_INQUIRY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,MANAGER_NICKNAME,MANAGER_NO,MANAGER_PROFILE,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END USER_INQUIRY_CREATE_DATE
FROM USER_INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME MANAGER_NICKNAME,MEMBER.MEMBER_NO MANAGER_NO,MEMBER_PROFILE MANAGER_PROFILE,USER_INQUIRY_NO FROM USER_INQUIRY LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO=USER_INQUIRY.USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_MEMBER_NO) USING(USER_INQUIRY_NO) WHERE USER_INQUIRY_NO = #{userInquiryNo}

CASE WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_DATE,

FROM USER_INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME MANAGER_NICKNAME,MEMBER.MEMBER_NO MANAGER_NO,MEMBER_PROFILE MANAGER_PROFILE,USER_INQUIRY_NO FROM USER_INQUIRY LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO=USER_INQUIRY.USER_INQUIRY_REQUEST_MEMBER_NO) USING(USER_INQUIRY_NO) WHERE USER_INQUIRY_NO = #{userInquiryNo}
